ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Dark Convoy looks at disk he carries Hot Rod didn t save you from the factory he defeated you on the star we purged and Wiped your core because he thought you

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Dark Convoy looks at disk he carries "Hot Rod didn't save you from the 
factory he defeated you on the star we purged and Wiped your core because he 
thought you might make a great warrior after all you were a great spark 
thief. You were originally Divine Darkness evil in holy white armor called 
Raging Demon in 10 systems but to us you were Drago. You and the rest of us 
collected more sparks than any of the others." Throws the disk to Lio "scan 
it"

Lio Scans the data and his memory is comes back. "Evil that is what I am 
That's what or who I am the darkness." Lio looks at dark convoy

The Matrix glows blue "That's who you were who you are is decided by the 
choices you make here and now. Besides that why I choose you a warrior that 
can walk through a light and a dark not lose his way because you tasted the 
fruit of both paths."
